title: Hextech Key Crafting
body:
Hey, I just wanted to know what the chances are of obtaining a skin by crafting key fragments.

I crafted 3x key fragments expecting to just get a key but instead I was rewarded with Hextech Chest, Riot Graves and a key.

Couldn’t find any other articles about this.

Thanks

replies.body:
Can't say I've ever heard of that one. The only thing similar is that sometimes when you open a chest, in addition to the normal content you will also get an extra chest and key.

Regardless, if you're especially curious you can ticket player support and they can look through your recent Hextech Crafting history to tell you exactly what happened.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
